languages.text: {n}Муаран некоторое время молча сверлит Ирлиэт взглядом, будто что-то взвешивает, а затем повелительно изрекает:{/n} "Ты пришла внезапно, Изгой Ирлиэт. Но, быть может, не без причины. Ты послужишь своему народу в скором времени".

{n}Muaran's gaze bores into Yrliet for a few moments in tense silence as he considers something in his mind. At last, he says in a commanding tone,{/n} "Your arrival is sudden, Outcast Yrliet. But perhaps there is purpose behind it. You will serve your people shortly."
languages.original_text: {n}Муаран некоторое время молча сверлит Ирлиэт взглядом, будто что-то взвешивает, а затем повелительно изрекает:{/n} "Ты пришла внезапно, Изгой Ирлиэт. Но, быть может, не без причины. Ты послужишь своему народу в скором времени".

traits.locale_text: {n}Muaran's gaze bores into Yrliet for a few moments of tense silence as he considers something in his mind. At last, he says in a commanding tone,{/n} "Your arrival is sudden, Outcast Yrliet. But perhaps there is purpose behind it. You will serve your people in short time."
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: {n}穆兰的目光紧紧地盯着伊莉耶特，在紧张的沉默中思考了片刻。最后，他以命令的口吻开了口。{/n}“你的到来过于突然，流浪者伊莉耶特。不过，或许这就是命运的安排。你很快就会为你的族人服务。”
languages.original_text: {n}Muaran's gaze bores into Yrliet for a few moments in tense silence as he considers something in his mind. At last, he says in a commanding tone,{/n} "Your arrival is sudden, Outcast Yrliet. But perhaps there is purpose behind it. You will serve your people shortly."

traits.locale_text: {n}穆兰的目光紧紧地盯着伊莉耶特，在紧张的沉默中思考了片刻。最后，他以命令的口吻开了口。{/n}“你的到来过于突然，流浪者伊莉耶特。不过，或许这就是命运的安排。你很快就会为你的族人服务。”
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: {n}ムアランはしばらくの間、静かにユリエットを見つめた。彼が何かを考えている間、張り詰めた空気が広がった。やっとのことで、彼は命令口調で言った。{/n}「お前の到着は突然のことだ、追放者ユリエット。だが、もしかすると目的があるのかもしれない。お前はまもなく仲間に仕えることになる」
languages.original_text: {n}Muaran's gaze bores into Yrliet for a few moments in tense silence as he considers something in his mind. At last, he says in a commanding tone,{/n} "Your arrival is sudden, Outcast Yrliet. But perhaps there is purpose behind it. You will serve your people shortly."

traits.locale_text: {n}ムアランはしばらくの間、静かにユリエットを見つめた。彼が何かを考えている間、張り詰めた空気が広がった。やっとのことで、彼は命令口調で言った。{/n}「お前の到着は突然のことだ、追放者ユリエット。だが、もしかすると目的があるのかもしれない。お前はまもなく仲間に仕えることになる」
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: {n}La mirada de Muaran atraviesa a Yrliet y guarda un tenso silencio mientras medita algo. Por fin, declara en tono imperioso.{/n} «Llegas de forma inesperada, proscrita Yrliet. Sin embargo, tal vez tenga sentido. Pronto servirás a tu pueblo».
languages.original_text: {n}Muaran's gaze bores into Yrliet for a few moments in tense silence as he considers something in his mind. At last, he says in a commanding tone,{/n} "Your arrival is sudden, Outcast Yrliet. But perhaps there is purpose behind it. You will serve your people shortly."

traits.locale_text: {n}La mirada de Muaran atraviesa a Yrliet y guarda un tenso silencio mientras medita algo. Por fin, declara en tono imperioso.{/n} «Llegas de forma inesperada, proscrita Yrliet. Sin embargo, tal vez tenga sentido. Pronto servirás a tu pueblo».
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: {n}Muarans Block bohrt sich einige Augenblicke lang in angespannter Stille in Yrliet, während er über etwas nachdenkt. Schließlich sagt er in gebieterischem Ton:{/n} "Eure Ankunft kommt plötzlich, Ausgestoßene Yrliet. Doch vielleicht liegt ein Sinn dahinter. Ihr werdet Eurem Volk schon bald dienen."
languages.original_text: {n}Muaran's gaze bores into Yrliet for a few moments in tense silence as he considers something in his mind. At last, he says in a commanding tone,{/n} "Your arrival is sudden, Outcast Yrliet. But perhaps there is purpose behind it. You will serve your people shortly."

traits.locale_text: {n}Muarans Block bohrt sich einige Augenblicke lang in angespannter Stille in Yrliet, während er über etwas nachdenkt. Schließlich sagt er in gebieterischem Ton:{/n} "Eure Ankunft kommt plötzlich, Ausgestoßene Yrliet. Doch vielleicht liegt ein Sinn dahinter. Ihr werdet Eurem Volk schon bald dienen."
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: {n}Muaran dévisage Yrliet pendant un certain temps, plongé dans une intense réflexion. Il finit par reprendre la parole sur un ton impérieux :{/n} « Votre venue est une surprise, Errante Yrliet, mais peut-être n'est-elle pas entièrement inopportune. Sous peu, vous serez utile à votre peuple. »
languages.original_text: {n}Muaran's gaze bores into Yrliet for a few moments in tense silence as he considers something in his mind. At last, he says in a commanding tone,{/n} "Your arrival is sudden, Outcast Yrliet. But perhaps there is purpose behind it. You will serve your people shortly."

Sous peu, vous serez utile à votre peuple. »
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: {n}Muaran, gözlerini bir süreliğine Yrliet'e dikiyor ve aklındaki bir şeyi düşünürken ortama gergin bir sessizlik hâkim oluyor. Nihayet emrivaki bir tavırla konuşuyor.{/n} "Gelişin çok ani oldu Yurtsuz Yrliet. Ancak bir amacı da olabilir. Soydaşlarına hizmet edişin yakındır."
languages.original_text: {n}Muaran's gaze bores into Yrliet for a few moments in tense silence as he considers something in his mind. At last, he says in a commanding tone,{/n} "Your arrival is sudden, Outcast Yrliet. But perhaps there is purpose behind it. You will serve your people shortly."

traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran
